summary: This script downloads a QQ image using curl, saves it as "qq_image_received.image", and is compatible with OpenCV for processing.

details.comment: This script downloads a QQ image using curl, saves it as "qq_image_received.image", and is compatible with OpenCV for processing.
details.content:
# you cannot receive qq voice with opq!
# but you can download image when it has not expired.
# what is the type of this image?
curl -L -o qq_image_received.image "http://gchat.qpic.cn/gchatpic_new/3318506826/205569604-2534335053-7D3B7BA4B3476AD210837D8C86F2E8DA/0?vuin=917521610&term=255&pictype=0"
# cv2 can handle that.
